response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds immense value to us, reflecting its worth of $800,000. We believe it could be a significant asset for you, offering unparalleled benefits and opportunities. Considering its quality and potential impact, we are extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. We hope you find it as valuable as we do. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 800000}
